name: Ants Together
description:
===========================================================

We made this game for the Brackeys  Game Jam 2021.1! The theme was "Stronger Together."

===========================================================

Developers:  Visual: Markavi (markavi.itch.io) Programmer: Yikon (yikon.itch.io) Sound Design: Luiz (neuraa.itch.io)

===========================================================

Controls: [WASD] - Movement [E] - Interact [P] - Buy Ants [B] - Open Upgrades Menu [Space ] - Toggle Attack / Gathering Mode [ESC] - Pause

===========================================================

How To Play:

You need to gather ants to protect your Town Hall, in order to do that, you need to gather Resources. There are 3 different type of resources, there are Gold, Wood, and Stone. You need gold in order to buy ants and Upgrades, you need wood and stone to buy upgrades as well. There is different kinds of Upgrades,  Attack Speed,  Ants Health, Ant Damage, and Town Hall Health. There are different kinds of enemy, one is EnergAnt, BulkAnt  and Hanter.  EnergAnt is fast but has less damage and health, BulkAnt has a lot of health but less speed and damage and Hanter is a normal ant.
